place_description:
Coffee shop by day and wine bar vibes at night. Check us out for natural wines, local craft beers, and a selection of handmade cocktails, as well as, light far served from open to close. We have a small but excellent selection of wines to go as well. With the largest selection of natural wines in Mint Hill.
Whether your thing is coffee, tea, boba, fresh hand-squeezed lemonade, beer, wine or anything in between this is the place to go for absolutely delicious beverages all day long.

reviews_data.review_text: Today, wife was looking for a pistachio latte.  Fortunately for us, Forrest Trail was literally right around the corner from us. I called to see if they had it.  They did!!!! My wife was very pleased!!!! We found i our coffee shop now!!!!

Cold brew was good, pastries were okay, just a tiny bit too sweet for my taste.

However, my latte was not great, almost half of it was foam, and the bouncy house out front was less than relaxing.

Owners and staff are amazing! Coffee shop is super welcoming and great for a lol date with the kiddos! They have a bounce house outside weather permitting! We had a meeting here and they were super accommodating!!

Love this place!!  The owners are super sweet and present.  The snack selection is wonderful.  They have curated speciality items from all over  (like my favorite, their Wisconsin Cheese).  They have a wide variety of drinks too.  Lots of options for kids and adults.  I highly recommend this Mint Hill gem!

Stopped by to get some coffee and treat for my wife. Coffee is tasty and hot but to my disappointment they only had full whipping cream and half and half,  no other healthier alternatives. Ordered two cinnamon rolls and they offered to heat them but I took them as is. Got to the car and mine was dry and hard, like it was old. Tried heating the second one when I got home and bleh, day old rolls. Kind  of an expensive $20 lesson for me but the coffee was good.
Always love coming here, staff is great and the coffee is delicious! Great meeting spot to catch up with friends or talking business.
Excellent service, great coffees, I love this place!

We continued our quest of trying out the local coffee shops in the greater Charlotte area and ended up here.  We ordered food, coffee, and tea.  The coffee was a light/medium roast and was quite good but not our personal favorite.  The tea was excellent.  We ordered the quiche and a stinger.  The quiche was amazing but the stinger was super dry, did not contain much meat, and was difficult to eat.  We would not get the stinger again but we would eat the quiche all day long.  The location is great and there is plenty of parking out back.  The atmosphere here was really great.  We will definitely be back if only for the quiche and to try a different type of coffee.  Nice place to chill out if you are in the Mint Hill area!

One of the best chai tea's I have had in a long time, there is a lot of space indoors and outside and it has a very relaxed atmosphere. The staff are extremely warm and welcoming, it feels more like going to a friends house then a shop.

My family went on a warm day. There were lots of people enjoying the outdoors so we consumed our coffees and pastries inside. It was spacious, quiet, and cool. The staff were friendly. The coffees and pastries were delicious and inexpensive.
Since moving to the area, it has been a great study spot for me with a great range of seating inside and outside. They also have a couple boardgames you can play with others while there.

How I love this place! Has been going for almost a year, it grows on me. The place is unique compared to other local coffee shops. I love their hot red eye coffee with half and half. The way they made is fabulous. I usually don't crazy about bakery from any coffee shops but somehow I keep eat their bakery, so that said a lot. Try choc chip bar and zucchini loaf! It also is family friendly, I brought toddler and infant sons here recently and my boys had so much fun. Employers are great. What I mean by this is that they actually are doing their job. In my judgment, they actually enjoying their job perhaps because of atmosphere. I appreciate their willingness to communicate with me as a deaf faithful costumer. Thank you for your excellent serving, FTH!

Super overrated place. Our hash browns were cold! Cold brew wasn't good. They have only one high chair. There's no room for a stroller. The tables are not very sturdy. We sat out on the side patio where apparently the bathroom window connects too and could smell someone's bowel movement! Definitely did not enjoy our experience.

This place is awesome!
I got a hot latte- which was spectacular- rich and bold, just how I like it.

Note: make sure you turn down the narrow gravel driveway and park in the back!!

The environment is excellent- it's an old house so there's multiple rooms you can get work done or hang out in. Then there's the front porch and yard where there's ample seating.

I can't wait to come back and try one of their delicious looking cinnamon rolls and scrumptious coffee and spend some time relaxing and journaling.
Love this place!  Great choice of hot drinks and snackables.
Love the vibe, the food, the coffee!!! The owners are amazing people. Definitely a place to check out and become a regular at!!
Amazing cafe!  Beer, Wine, Coffee in cozy atmosphere for all!
Nice spot for families with small children
While I only had a coffee my friend had a muffin and another had tea and another pastry. Homey atmosphere comfortable! I will be back
Nice ambience. Great service. Good hot coffee

Forest Trail Coffee House is a gem! They have delicious coffee (perfect for coffee enthusiasts) and a cozy atmosphere. The staff is friendly and helpful, making it a great place to relax or catch up with friends. Plus, they offer tasty food options for those wanting a lite snack. Highly recommend!

Okay so....today was my first time trying this coffee shop. My husband and I were out running errands and I needed a pick me up so instead trying to find a Starbucks we wanted to try local instead, which is what we prefer. Upon entering, the atmosphere is very chill and quaint, but the service was extremely lacking. When we got to the counter we were met with a rude, blank stare just waiting for our order with no hello or welcome, and then a "what are you having". I told the girl it was our first time there and we didn't see the coffee menu (to explain our delay in ordering) and she just stood there with no reply, no beckoning to where the menu was, nor a recommendation. We eventually looked around and found the menu and ordered 2 Americanos (we would've ordered more with suggestion or even friendliness but decided against it). After getting our EXTREMELY HOT coffees, we tried adding sugar to them but it melted the straws and couldn't stir. After getting into the car, the coffees were too hot to drink and started to warp the lids and coffee cups. Now I'm sitting here, pulled over in a parking lot writing this review with hot coffee ALL OVER ME and my car because just picking the cup up made the coffee burst up from the cup, popping up the lid. I STILL haven't even gotten a chance to taste my coffee! If I had the time I would've gone back to complain in person. The sad part is that if the service had been better, friendlier, maybe I wouldn't be as upset, but her rudeness almost made me feel as if this was almost on purpose....as a person of color, I would hate to think this was the reason for a 4.9 reviewed coffee house to deliver such poor service...
Great coffee with fast and polite service. Really not much more you could ask for. Oddly enough, they've got a great beer selection at well.

What a fun place. Another home turned into a relaxing spot to hang out alone and use wifi, bring your kids for some outdoor play and bounce house time or just spend time with friends. Great coffee, reasonable selection of beer at reasonable prices, sweets to enjoy with your coffee. Nothing matches but that's what adds to the "homey" atmosphere. Customers are just as friendly as the staff.

Really really great spot and great wifi. What I presume to be the owner was very gracious  and kind. The drip coffee was really good which can be an easy miss! We will be back to try the breakfast sandwiches because they look amazing! Thank you Forest Trail House!
Great local Coffee shop with a good variety of options.

Friendly barista and comfortable couches on the front porch. The marshmallow latte was not the best I've ever had (not sweet enough) but I'd be willing to go back and give one of their other drinks a try.
Great coffee, a wide selection of food, and super family friendly!
Bonito limpio y elegante

A wonderful little coffee shop.  It was very crowded inside today but we sat outside because we had our dog with us.  The muffins were really good along with the coffee.   A little hidden gem in Mint Hill.

Nice cozy place in mint hill. I had regular coffee which was good. Wife had chai which was also good. Nice little place. Staff is super nice. Happy to support a local business. Doggies allowed outside

I don't think you could honestly get anymore of a cozy homey feeling in a cafe that your going to be getting here. Forest Trail is a house that was converted into a cafe, and it just has the most laid back and relaxing atmosphere. I had actually stopped in here a week ago with a friend and ordered a hot chai with their zucchini bread. It was so good that I had to come back again today and get the exact same thing! Their zucchini bread is so moist and delicious that I was thinking about it after I left the first time. The hot chai was also pretty good. It was a little sweet today but it still hit the spot on a rainy day.

They have anything from jazz to alternative music on their record player which really completes the atmosphere and allows you to settle in. There are also various rooms and spots where you can enjoy your coffee and baked goods. The spacious parking lot in the back is a huge plus too. This is an all around great place to grab a coffee and chill, and I will happily continue supporting this business!

This Minthill downtown cafe provides excellent workspaces and outdoor areas for kids, creating a family-friendly environment. However, the coffee quality doesn't quite meet expectations. If you value a comfortable work setting and outdoor space for children, it could be a suitable choice despite the coffee.
Amazing experience. I tasted the cinnamon roll, and it was perfect. My apple cider was also very tasty. Micah was friendly and helpful.
Cool atmosphere. Seems like you're at a house just chilling coffee was amazing along with the quiche.
Coffee good but not a lot of ambience

Stopped by this morning to try the new place out as I used to frequent the old coffee shop! Anyone that knows me, knows I love coffee! I had high hopes. All I wanted this morning was a LARGE coffee. It was $4.36, looks like a grande at bux, and it wasn't filled to the top! I'll try it again another day!

Forest Trail is gem to have here in Mint Hill. The service is excellent, super friendly and it gives a small town coffee shop vibe while here.  Highly recommend stopping out for a coffee or even a drink in the evening when they have one of their events. Awesome place all around.

I cannot say enough amazing things about Forest Trail House! We had our daughter's birthday party here. Colin and his wife, the owners, were exceptionally kind, hospitable and helpful. The staff was awesome, friendly and professional. The food and drinks were delicious. Finally, the atmosphere is beautiful! They did a phenomenal job of renovating this coffee shop and turning it into a spot that both parents and children can enjoy. They have engaging ongoing events. We will definitely be coming back often and spreading the word to everyone we know!

Enjoyed the latte, but didn't enjoy paying $7.25 for a small size latte with 1 extra shot, for a total of 2 shots. Great service and delicious latte, but in Matthews 2 days ago I got a Grande size latte with 4 shots and paid $2 less! Just sayin'.
Super fun place to hang out. Delicious coffee and lots of freshly made baked goods!
I love Forest Trail! It's my go to hang out spot in Mint Hill. The atmosphere is cozy, the food and drinks are great, and the staff are amazing!
Great coffee and service! New bakery items each time I go in are excellent as well. Highly recommend.

Couldn't recommend Forest Trail House enough! Their coffees, pastries and sandwiches are absolutely delicious. The quiche, cinnamon rolls, stingers and pumpkin muffins are amongst the favorites. We really enjoy the cocktail, wine & beer selections too! We have a blast at 'Questions with Colin' every Thursday evening; if you know you know  The atmosphere is awesome...brand new (sorta ) space heaters on the patio keep it cozy even in cooler weather. There's lots of cozy spots inside to work and hang out as well.
Coffee was great bagel and cream cheese was so so. Great service and atmosphere!
Great local coffee spot.
A coffee shop with a fenced in area AND a bounce house is the perfect combination!

We enjoyed our 1st time experience at this coffee shop. I love it when staff understand that not everyone is a coffee snob, hahaha. I explain that I want to like coffee but just not a huge fan, so I prefer the blended/frappe types with lots of flavor to overpower the coffee taste. I ordered a pumpkin spice frappe, and it's pretty good. We didn't try any of the food items, but they were very tempting.
Great coffee shop and atmosphere!

Cute little spot-here on a Saturday and has a bounce house, outdoor fun for kids, adorable indoor spot, and the coffee and food is delicious!!  Great local beers and such also come support this local gem
So good! Just needs more seating.
We just moved to Mint Hill and I have already found my favorite spot! They've done such a cute job with this little house! Great coffee, and baked goods with a cool modern  atmosphere!
Love the coffee and the atmosphere! It's a great place to bring your kiddos!

I love Forest Trail House! It's wonderful to have a nice coffee shop in Mint Hill. My family and I have been really pleased with the quality of the lattes. I tried the pumpkin latte today and it is one of the best I've ever had! You should try it! I've met one of the owners a few times, and he was incredibly kind. The baristas have all been pleasant as well. My favorite place to sit is on the front porch. It similar to the old coffee shop that was here but is more modern, and, in my opinion, serves better coffee.
First time at Forest Trail, 5 dogs coffee. The pastries look amazing. Lots of great areas to sit and talk. Coffee choices are a extensive! Will definitely be back.

Can never say enough about how much my little family and I love this spot! We are always greeted by the smiling faces of the baristas and the coffee and in house made food never disappoint. I tell pretty much anyone I meet that they need to run, not walk to this delightful establishment. Can't wait to see how it continues to grow and expand as the community continues to love it even more!
Vegan baked goods and latte were fabulous and service was excellent!
Coffee is delicious and the blueberry muffins are on point!!!
Incredible local spot for the perfect iced coffee! Also picked up some delicious natural wine for dinner, thanks Forest Trail House!

Finally a good coffee shop in Mint Hill! The food and muffins are very good and freshly made not bought. The breakfast stinger is the bomb. Coffee and drinks are great as well. This spot has been revamped from the old coffee shop there, they did a great job. Much cleaner and nicer atmosphere. All around two thumbs up!
Amazing place to work, talk with a friend, or just enjoy the atmosphere. The staff is so friendly and the product is delicious! 10/10 recommend!
Recently moved from Florida.  So so happy to have found a local cozy coffeehouse.   Coffee is excellent assortment of treats ... so yummy !  Special events!  Wonderful highly recommend   !
Love Forest Trail!!!  Coffee is delicious!  Loved our muffins and zucchini loaf too!!!  Yummy spot!  Service awesome!
Love what you've done to the place!

Very cozy little place! Loved the vibe here! The Coffee, blue berry muffin, and Zucchini bread were so good. I also had their bagel egg, cheese, and bacon sandwich, it was excellent. There are multiple rooms for privacy, and as soon as you walk in there's a little spot with a record player with some vinyl. If you're a college student, this could be a great spot as well. Aside from coffee,, this place also sells wine, beer, and tea!

Rebecca and Kirra were so nice and awesome! Very efficient with great customer service! Very family friendly place.. Make sure to check this little spot out!

The atmosphere is wonderful, and we love that they carry Sunflower Club's GF items (Mint Hill)! And their baked goods (that they make), my family loved! Service is with a smile and the atmosphere is clean and bright... absolutely wonderful!

The only thing I give a lower star for is that while the coffee is generally good, the decaf for a latte is pour over - so it's a bit watered down. We will try coming in earlier in the day, sometime soon, to try a latte where we can have regular espresso and revise later.
Looking for quite literally a perfect coffee shop? Here you go.
Great iced latte and blueberry muffin.  Good atmosphere!!
The place is cozy yet modern. The new owners are really nice, coffee is delicious.
Consistently great coffee and food every visit- the cutest atmosphere and nicest staff. We love Forest Trail!

So glad there are new owners in this location! I loved the coffee house before, and was sad to see it go. The new owners have really cleaned it up, while still keeping the charm. And my coffee was great!
Little Hidden Gem of a Coffee Shop. Good Selections on Coffee, Wine and Beer while also having a very peaceful and chill atmosphere.
I was able to enjoy the delicious S'mores latte and bacon/egg/cheese bagel while working. The wifi works fantastic and the couch I sat on was comfortable. Can't wait for my next visit!
The coffee is so good. Chill environment accompanied with friendly service.
Delicious Blueberry Muffin to go with my coffee!! Very impressed with our new coffee shop!!

It's a house converted into a coffee shop/ roasting facility. Great atmosphere, sat outside and enjoyed a beautiful summer day
Friendly staff, would come again
Love our new coffee shop!!
I visited this new owner and found the coffee to be excellent. The atmosphere is soothing and the staff is efficient. I totally recommend Forest Traul Coffee
